reference-usage:
Form

  • It is recommended that you use the Compact Inline Form with the Login Layout.

Background Image

  • Login Layout background images need to be big enough to cover the whole browser window on big monitors, so 1600x1200 is recommended.
  • Background image can be customized using theme variable or by replacing the following image: "assets/images/login_bkgd.jpg", make sure to use the same file format and file name, along with the same dimensions (1600px X 1200px)

Customizations

  • Enable/disable "Welcome To" sub-header
  • Enable/disable header sub-text.
  • One or two column layout, if one column is used, the container is centered.
  • Background image can be customized using theme variable or by replacing the following image: "assets/images/login_bkgd.jpg", make sure to use the same file format and file name, along with the same dimensions (1600px X 1200px)
